statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // empty'); cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null; dir=$(basename "$cwd"); branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); worktree=$(git rev-parse --path-format=relative --git-common-dir 2>/dev/null | grep -q '^\.git/worktrees/' && basename "$(git rev-parse --git-dir 2>/dev/null)" 2>/dev/null || echo ""); status=""; if [ -n "$branch" ]; then git diff --quiet 2>/dev/null || status="*"; git diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null || status="${status}+"; fi; printf "\033[1;34m%s\033[0m" "$dir"; if [ -n "$worktree" ]; then printf " \033[1;35m[wt:%s]\033[0m" "$worktree"; fi; if [ -n "$branch" ]; then printf " on \033[1;36m%s%s\033[0m" "$branch" "$status"; fi; printf " [%s]" "$model"; if [ -n "$used" ]; then printf " (ctx: %.0f%%)" "$used"; fi
